text: @SpeakerPelosi Miss Pelosi, I'm positive Mr. Atkinson will be fine in a better position.This last few days I have been trying to demonstrate the importance of PRIORITIZING the development of a COVID-19 VACCINE which apparently is not happening. I wonder if Mr. Atkinson did? C.Vaccine is a must!
